long_description: Built with lightweight, breathable, quick-drying and moisture-wicking fabric, the women's Patagonia Fore Runner T-shirt offers reliable comfort on the running trail and beyond. Fabric offers UPF 30 sun protection and resists odors. Reflective logos on chest and center back enhance visibility. Offset seams reduce chafing. The women's Patagonia Fore Runner T-shirt offers a slim fit.
short_description: Built with lightweight, breathable, quick-drying and moisture-wicking fabric, the women's Patagonia Fore Runner T-shirt offers reliable comfort on the running trail and beyond.
